Verses: 1 appadiyirukka, Sagodharare, Neengal Ungal Sareerangalaip Parisuththamum Dhevanukkup Piriyamumaana Jeevabaliyaaga Oppukkodukkavendumendru, Dhevanudaiya Irakkangalai Munnittu Ungalai Vendikkollugiren; Idhuve Neengal Seyyaththakka Buththiyulla Aaraadhanai.

2 neengal Indhap Pirabanjaththirku Oththa Veshanthariyaamal, Dhevanudaiya Nanmaiyum Piriyamum Paripooranamumaana Siththam Innadhendru Paguththariyaththakkadhaaga, Ungal Manam Pudhidhaagiradhinaale Maruroobamaagungal.

3 allaamalum, Enakku Arulappatta Kirubaiyinaale Naan Sollugiradhaavadhu; Ungalil Evanaanaalum Thannaikkuriththu Ennavendiyadharku Minji Ennaamal, Avanavanukku Dhevan Pagirndha Visuvaasa Alavinpadiye, Thelindha Ennamullavanaai Ennavendum.
4 enenil, Namakku Ore Sareeraththile Anega Avayavangalirundhum, Ellaa Avayavangalukkum Ore Thozhil Iraadhadhupola,
5 anegaraagiya Naamum Kiristhuvukkul Ore Sareeramaayirukka, Oruvarukkoruvar Avayavangalaayirukkirom.
6 namakku Arulappatta Kirubaiyinpadiye Naam Vevveraana Varangalullavargalaanapadiyinaale, Nammil Theerkkadharisananjsollugira Varaththaiyudaiyavan Visuvaasappiramaanaththukketradhaaka Sollakkadavan.
7 oozhiyanjseygiravan Oozhiyaththilum, Podhikkiravan Podhikkiradhilum,

8 buththisollugiravan Buththisollugiradhilum Thariththirukkakkadavan; Pagirndhu Kodukkiravan Vanjanaiyillaamal Kodukkakkadavan; Mudhalaaliyaanavan Jaakkiradhaiyaayirukkakkadavan; Irakkanjseygiravan Urchaagaththudane Seyyakkadavan.
9 ungal Anbu Maayamatradhaayiruppadhaaga; Theemaiyai Veruththu, Nanmaiyaippatrikkondirungal.
10 sagodhara Sinegaththile Oruvarmeloruvar Patchamaayirungal; Ganampannugiradhile Oruvarukkoruvar Mundhikkollungal.
11 asadhiyaayiraamal Jaakkiradhaiyaayirungal; Aaviyile Analaayirungal; Karththarukkuoozhiyanjseyyungal.
12 nambikkaiyile Sandhoshamaayirungal; Ubaththiravaththile Porumaiyaayirungal; Jebaththile Urudhiyaaith Thariththirungal.
13 parisuththavaangaludaiya Kuraivil Avargalukku Udhaviseyyungal; Anniyarai Ubasarikka Naadungal.
14 ungalaith Thunbappaduththugiravargalai Aaseervadhiyungal, Aaseervadhikkavendiyadheyandri Sabiyaadhirungal.
15 sandhoshappadugiravargaludane Sandhoshappadungal; Azhugiravargaludane Azhungal.
16 oruvarodoruvar Egasindhaiyullavargalaayirungal; Mettimaiyaanavaigalaich Sindhiyaamal, Thaazhmaiyaanavargalukku Inangungal; Ungalaiye Buththimaangalendru Ennaadhirungal.
17 oruvanukkum Theemaikkuth Theemaiseyyaadhirungal; Ellaa Manusharukkumunbaagavum Yokkiyamaanavaigalai Seyya Naadungal.
18 koodumaanaal Ungalaalaanamattum Ellaa Manusharodum Samaadhaanamaayirungal.
19 piriyamaanavargale, Pazhivaangudhal Enakkuriyadhu, Naane Padhircheyven, Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiyaal, Neengal Pazhivaangaamal, Kobaakkinaikku Idankodungal.
20 andriyum, Un Saththuru Pasiyaayirundhaal, Avanukkup Pojanankodu; Avan Thaagamaayirundhaal, Avanukkup Baanankodu; Nee Ippadi Seyvadhinaal Akkiniththazhalai Avan Thalaiyinmel Kuvippaai.
21 nee Theemaiyinaale Vellappadaamal, Theemaiyai Nanmaiyinaale Vellu.
